name: The Hero, The Princess, And The Demon King
name_original: The Hero, The Princess, And The Demon King
description:
A short card-based dungeon crawler originally made for MiniJam 96: Fate

The Princess has just been kidnapped by the Demon King, and whisked away to his castle! 

Please, brave hero, I implore you - please save the Princess!

Exercise caution, however, as any who step in the Demon King's castle will be cursed by a foul spell - linking your life force to his.

Perhaps there is a way to use this to your advantage . . .

In this game, you are presented with a set of 3 cards - which can be either a monster or an item. This set is a representation of a "room" within the Demon King's castle.

Clearing a set (picking up every card) will allow you to the next "room" - and eventually, to the next "strata".

When you take damage, so does the Demon King. Use this to your advantage to vanquish the Demon King and save the princess!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Pick card

R - reset the game

Considering this game was made in a few days, please expect some bugs to occur! 

If you get stuck, you can use the reset button . . .
